sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sys_metadata</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>true</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Put display name on scratchpad</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[function onDisplay(current, g_scratchpad) { //This function will be automatically called when this rule is processed. g_scratchpad.create_now_studio = g_scratchpad.create_now_studio ? g_scratchpad.create_now_studio : {}; g_scratchpad.create_now_studio.display_name = current.getDisplayName() + ''; }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2015-03-25 17:55:57</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>324c8745d7033100b6bddb0c825203eb</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Put display name on scratchpad</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Studio" source="sn_devstudio">5d9789f3eb51310007e48c1cf106fe9e</sys_package> <sys_policy>read</sys_policy> <sys_scope display_value="Studio">5d9789f3eb51310007e48c1cf106fe9e</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_324c8745d7033100b6bddb0c825203eb</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2015-07-20 19:32:08</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before_display</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=324c8745d7033100b6bddb0c825203eb"/> </record_update>
